sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>copyin assessment result to worknotes</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var questions='';
var survey_response = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_result');
survey_response.addEncodedQuery('assessment_group.numberLIKEASG0010175');
survey_response.query();
while(survey_response.next())
{
questions = questions + survey_response.metric.getDisplayValue() + ' ' + survey_response.string_value.getDisplayValue()+ '\n';

//notes = notes + survey_response.instance_question.getDisplayValue() + ' ' + survey_response.string_value + '\n';
gs.print(questions);

}
var qq=questions;
var parent_record = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
parent_record.addQuery('sys_id','8ddb65fa47597150020ba9f8536d4367');
parent_record.query();
if(parent_record.next())
{

gs.print(parent_record.number);
parent_record.work_notes = qq;
parent_record.update();
//gs.print(parent_record.comments(-1));
}

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Eshwitha</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-19 11:43:46</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4e285efe475d7150020ba9f8536d43e1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>copyin assessment result to worknotes</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4e285efe475d7150020ba9f8536d43e1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>Eshwitha</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-19 11:46:57</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
